description: Try our easy to follow Easy spaghetti with mushrooms and ginger recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Easy spaghetti with mushrooms and ginger
name: Easy spaghetti with mushrooms and ginger Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add spaghetti, reserved pasta water and peas, stirring to coat with the sauce. Cook for 1 minute to reheat pasta. Serve topped with parmesan.
